definition: nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods
quilt wrapped around the body as a tube (traditional bedding)/(contemporary) bedding/quilt/blankets/cover/bed
like a swarm of bees/everyone swarms around pushing and shouting/a hornet's nest
dimple/also written 酒渦|酒涡[jiu3 wo1]
aggrieved/dejected/(Tw, southern China) to be moved by a kind gesture etc/to feel gratified/to feel warm inside

sentences.english: It is a bold mouse that nestles in cat's ear.
sentences.chinese: 再胆大的老鼠也不敢在猫耳朵里做窝。

sentences.english: He counted the creases of rucked leather wherein another's foot had nested warm.
sentences.chinese: 他数着皮面上的皱纹，这曾经是另一个人暖脚的窝。

sentences.english: For his lair he had the sewer of the Arche-Marion.
sentences.chinese: 他的窝在马利容桥拱的暗沟里。

sentences.english: Female tigers in the wild can live up to 15 years averagely.
sentences.chinese: 野生雌虎的寿命大约是15年，平均能产下5窝虎仔。

sentences.english: Innovative, yet proven, SolidWorks software is the standard in 3D.
sentences.chinese: 创新至今，证实了烧窝是三维的标准。

sentences.english: It's a bold mouse that nestles in the cat's ear.
sentences.chinese: 再胆大的老鼠也不敢在猫耳朵里做窝。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical features and surgical outcome of the traumatic hematomas posterior cranial fossa .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨外伤性后颅窝血肿的临床特征和手术疗效。

sentences.english: Reread the letters, with your hand cupped over your ear.
sentences.chinese: 重读我的信件，用手在耳边窝成杯状。

sentences.english: Cystic cerebellar astrocytoma comprises about 33% of all posterior fossa tumors in children.
sentences.chinese: 囊性星形细胞瘤占儿童后颅窝肿瘤的33%。

sentences.english: God knows where even a sparrow calls home.
sentences.chinese: 上帝自然哪里都知道，甚至是燕雀窝。

sentences.english: Asian ants build up piles of grasshopper debt and feel rich.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲蚂蚁积累了大量的蚱蜢窝债权，感觉很富有。

sentences.english: A small number may actually invade into the middle cranial fossa via the foramen rotundum or vidian canal.
sentences.chinese: 少数可以通过圆孔和维杜斯管侵犯至中颅窝。

sentences.english: The rate of the empty lacuna increased with the time of experiment.
sentences.chinese: 且骨陷窝空虚率随用药时间的延长而增加。

sentences.english: Nothing was stolen, but now a family of birds is living somewhere in my house.
sentences.chinese: 东西倒是一样没少，就是有一家子鸟飞进来扎了窝。

sentences.english: Her nest was beautifully constructed out of bits of rubbish.
sentences.chinese: 她废物利用漂亮地搭建了巢窝。

sentences.english: The sitting position is most often used for neurosurgical procedures, especially in the posterior fossa.
sentences.chinese: 坐位手术通常用于神经外科手术，特别是颅后窝手术。

definition: quilt wrapped around the body as a tube (traditional bedding)/(contemporary) bedding/quilt/blankets/cover/bed
to curl up (like a scroll)/to huddle/Melania libertina/wriggle (as a worm)
to get into/to dig into (studies, job etc)/to squeeze into
to have nothing to do/to idle one's time away (idiom)
to be in the sun (getting warm or sunbathing etc)/to put sth in the sun (e.g. to dry it)
